sentences.en: " Oh, Scarlett, you are so young you wring my heart, " he said.
sentences.cn: " 唔, 思嘉, 你真像个孩子,可把我的心都揪痛了, " 他说.

sentences.en: Buyers use different ruses to wring free credit out of their suppliers.
sentences.cn: 买主们千方百计想从供货商那儿无息赊购。

sentences.en: He turned away to wring out the wet shirt.
sentences.cn: 他走开去把湿衬衫拧干。

sentences.en: I still love you even though I'd like to wring your neck.
sentences.cn: 虽然我想掐死你，但我还是爱你的。

sentences.en: I'll wring his calf's head off his body with these hands.
sentences.cn: 我要用这双手将他那牛脖子拧下来.

sentences.en: I'll wring your neck if you don't behave!
sentences.cn: 你要是不规矩,我就拧断你的脖子.

sentences.en: If I find the person who did this, I'll wring his neck!
sentences.cn: 我要是找出这是谁干的, 我非掐死他不可!

sentences.en: If I had you in my hands, I would wring your neck!
sentences.cn: 假如我捉到你的话, 我要拧断你的脖子.

sentences.en: My socks were so wet that I had to wring them.
sentences.cn: 我的袜子很湿,我不得不拧干它们.

sentences.en: Remember to wring your swimsuit out after you swim.
sentences.cn: 记住游泳过后要把游泳衣拧干.

sentences.en: She wanted to wring his experiences from him at once.
sentences.cn: 她迫不及待地想从他嘴里得知他的全部经历.

sentences.en: The girl's pitiful history would wring one's withers.
sentences.cn: 这女孩子的经历令人心碎.

sentences.en: This is a tale that wring the heart.
sentences.cn: 这是个令人心痛的故事.
这件上衣湿得都能拧出水来！

words.tran_cn: 勒索者；绞拧机；绞扭的人；令人心力交困的事
蠕动；扭动；感到痛苦；感到苦恼

phrases.tran_cn: 苦恼地（或绝望地）绞拧双手
高级特技飞行；绞出；扭干
浑身湿透；(衣服)湿得拧得出水来

trans.tran_en: to tightly twist a wet cloth or wet clothes in order to remove water

trans.tran_cn: 蠕动，扭动，感到痛苦，感到苦恼
绞，拧，扭干，绞出，折磨，使苦恼，曲解
